channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Emptoris Strategic Supply Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Emptoris Strategic Supply Management

item.title: CVE-2016-8952|2024-09-16T19:36:18.106Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20strategic%20supply%20management
item.description: IBM Emptoris Strategic Supply Management Platform 10.0.0.x through 10.1.1.x is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 118839.

item.title: CVE-2020-4893|2024-09-16T22:36:16.982Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20strategic%20supply%20management
item.description: IBM Emptoris Strategic Supply Management 10.1.0, 10.1.1, and 10.1.3 transmits sensitive information in HTTP GET request parameters. This may lead to information disclosure via man in the middle methods. IBM X-Force ID: 190984.

item.title: CVE-2017-1190|2024-09-16T19:41:49.584Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20strategic%20supply%20management
item.description: IBM Emptoris Strategic Supply Management Platform 10.x and 10.1 could allow a local user with special access roles to execute arbitrary code on the system. By manipulating a configurable property, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain full control over the system. IBM X-Force ID: 123559.

item.title: CVE-2019-4752|2024-09-16T18:54:04.139Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20strategic%20supply%20management
item.description: IBM Emptoris Spend Analysis and IBM Emptoris Strategic Supply Management Platform 10.1.0.x, 10.1.1.x, and 10.1.3.x is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 173348.

item.title: CVE-2017-1097|2024-09-16T16:28:01.282Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20strategic%20supply%20management
item.description: IBM Emptoris Strategic Supply Management Platform 10.0.0.x through 10.1.1.x is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 120657.

item.title: CVE-2016-6021|2024-09-16T20:57:21.632Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20strategic%20supply%20management
item.description: IBM Emptoris Strategic Supply Management Platform 10.0 and 10.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 116755.

item.title: CVE-2020-4898|2024-09-16T17:59:46.347Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20strategic%20supply%20management
item.description: IBM Emptoris Strategic Supply Management 10.1.3 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 190989.

item.title: CVE-2016-6019|2024-09-16T21:02:54.064Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20strategic%20supply%20management
item.description: IBM Emptoris Strategic Supply Management Platform 10.0.0.x through 10.1.1.x is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 116739.

item.title: CVE-2016-6029|2024-09-16T22:56:01.377Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20strategic%20supply%20management
item.description: IBM Emptoris Strategic Supply Management Platform 10.0 and 10.1 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 116881.
